Title: Nations Game
Description: Nations is a graphics-less game that uses Windows Forms controls for gameplay.  Rule your own country and wage war on others!  Created in Visual Basic 2010. Alpha version (Not yet completed).
HomeWiki:
What is Nations?

Nations is a graphics-less game that uses Windows forms controls for gameplay. Similar to NationStates and SimCountry. Rule your own nation and wage war on others. In alpha stages.

New Screenshots coming soon.
